name: Man, Lord of Machinery
description:
The Diplomat Agénour attends the great procession to the Inauguration of the Machines.  What unfolds there will change America - the Machine Republic - forever. In July 1923, Nobel Laureate Romaine Roilland published an unproduced silent film screenplay in Vanity Fair magazine.  In 2018, that screenplay entered the public domain.  This is an interactive fiction adaptation of that screenplay.

It was written for the Gaming Like It's 1923 Jam.
